title: Bicromo Watch Face
summary: High-quality stylish watch face design for your everyday.
developerAddress:
Rodrigo Quesada
Villa Esperanza, Pavas, Calle 134, Avenida 17, apartamento esquinero noroeste blanco #3
San José, Costa Rica
10109 CR
description: Bicromo Watch Face is a high-quality stylish watch face design for your everyday. Wear it and take the design with you anywhere you go!It's available in 10 different colors, giving you plenty of options to match with your different outfits and accessories.It comes with a unique design targeted for your specific watch's shape (circular or square), so you don't have to worry about the design not fitting your watch's screen (see the sample images).This watch face is specially designed using the official Watch Face API from Google, which means that it's optimized for low energy consumption when using your watch in ambient mode and for helping protect your watch's screen when used with burn-in protection. This also means that you won't need to install any other app in order to use it.Features:• Animated watch hands.• Available in 10 different colors (blue, red, green, turquoise, light blue, yellow, brown, purple, pink and black).• Support for circular and square watches.• Optimized for ambient mode.• Low-bit ambient mode support.• Burn-in protection support.Feel free to contact us if you have any trouble running this app in your watch, we want to make sure everyone can enjoy wearing it! :)
descriptionHTML:
Bicromo Watch Face is a high-quality stylish watch face design for your everyday. Wear it and take the design with you anywhere you go!
It's available in 10 different colors, giving you plenty of options to match with your different outfits and accessories.
It comes with a unique design targeted for your specific watch's shape (circular or square), so you don't have to worry about the design not fitting your watch's screen (see the sample images).
This watch face is specially designed using the official Watch Face API from Google, which means that it's optimized for low energy consumption when using your watch in ambient mode and for helping protect your watch's screen when used with burn-in protection. This also means that you won't need to install any other app in order to use it.

Features:
• Animated watch hands.
• Available in 10 different colors (blue, red, green, turquoise, light blue, yellow, brown, purple, pink and black).
• Support for circular and square watches.
• Optimized for ambient mode.
• Low-bit ambient mode support.
• Burn-in protection support.

Feel free to contact us if you have any trouble running this app in your watch, we want to make sure everyone can enjoy wearing it! :)
